cellery

Class Automaton

  • java.lang.Object
    • cellery.Automaton
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Automaton1D, Automaton2D

    public abstract class Automaton
extends java.lang.Object
    Automaton is an object that can evolve Cells contained within a CellArray2D or CellArray1D.
    Author:
    Zach Tidwell
